text: Millions of Americans right now are wondering how they’re going to make their rent or mortgage payments in April. They have to be our priority. Not corporations, not CEOs, and not Wall Street.

The developments of this Senate relief bill are concerning.

We are hearing lots of vague statements, but not a single member of Congress has seen actual bill text.

It seems to give a *HALF TRILLION DOLLARS* away to big corporations, w/ few worker protections.

Half a trillion.

The Chinese Communist Party suppressed information about the #COVID19 outbreak from the world for political purposes. Rather than take accountability they are actively pushing a conspiracy theory propaganda campaign against the United States.

Two weeks ago, I asked the BOP about their plans to prevent & manage coronavirus in federal prisons & jails. Now there are reports of infections of incarcerated people & staff – but still no BOP response to our letter. We’re waiting. https://www.warren.senate.gov/oversight/letters/warren-colleagues-demand-answers-to-questions-about-federal-bureau-of-prisons-and-private-prison-companys-readiness-for-coronavirus-pandemic https://twitter.com/SenWarren/status/1237433976979181570 QT @SenWarren Over 175k people are incarcerated in federal prisons & jails & are especially vulnerable to coronavirus. I asked the BOP & private prison companies what they’re doing to protect incarcerated people, staff, & visitors from a potential outbreak. https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2020/03/elizabeth-warren-just-told-private-prisons-to-release-their-coronavirus-plans/
